name: openvoxellauncher
description: A Minecraft Launcher for OpenVoxel Studios!

scripts.prepare-notdev: node -e "var old = require('./intern.json'); old.devMode = false; require('node:fs').writeFileSync('./intern.json', JSON.stringify(old, undefined, 2), { encoding: 'utf-8' });"
scripts.prepare-dev: node -e "var old = require('./intern.json'); old.devMode = true; require('node:fs').writeFileSync('./intern.json', JSON.stringify(old, undefined, 2), { encoding: 'utf-8' });"
scripts.dev: npm run prepare-dev && npm run electron
scripts.start: npm run prepare-notdev && npm run electron
scripts.build-mac: npm run prepare-notdev && npx electron-builder --mac --publish never
scripts.build-win: npm run prepare-notdev && npx electron-builder --win --publish never
scripts.build-linux: npm run prepare-notdev && npx electron-builder --linux --publish never
scripts.testbuild-mac: npm run prepare-dev && npx electron-builder --mac --publish never
scripts.testbuild-win: npm run prepare-dev && npx electron-builder --win --publish never
scripts.testbuild-linux: npm run prepare-dev && npx electron-builder --linux --publish never
